TopicTitle: Mod Community Base 3.0 - multiple bases, limited actions allowed - see rules

Articles.Content:
Tim, can you please add C7 as your add-to-list mod?

I had thought that SpeedoLlama\'s shuttle used C7, since I could not for the life of me get a stock [excepting engines] Mk3-cabin shuttle into *orbit*, let alone to the *Mun*. But C7 is not on the mod list, nor is it in the list of mods to be added.

Since only one mod can be added at a time [and my chosen mod is the VA Flight Pack], I can\'t have C7 too. But since you [Tim] are likely to use it in future developments, I thought you\'d be the best person to ask.

Also, I think your *Yenya* is a C7-built ship, but you forgot to mention that.

> 
> 1gig? Holy crap, how does that even run? My computer uses 1 gig when idling! KSP uses 3.8 gigs for me.

XD idk. it does tho, at a crappy FPS ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) at least only on kerbin.

it dosent run, it walks ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Finally getting around to launching. Will be done in about an hour.

Erm.... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) The HQ exploded when I drove my rover up to it...

> ![screenshot0.png](http://i1239.photobucket.com/albums/ff503/Misterspork/Cloria%20I%20Mun%20Base/screenshot0.png)

On the pad

> ![screenshot12.png](http://i1239.photobucket.com/albums/ff503/Misterspork/Cloria%20I%20Mun%20Base/screenshot12.png)

Lander, landed

> ![screenshot13.png](http://i1239.photobucket.com/albums/ff503/Misterspork/Cloria%20I%20Mun%20Base/screenshot13.png)

Rover deployed

> ![screenshot14.png](http://i1239.photobucket.com/albums/ff503/Misterspork/Cloria%20I%20Mun%20Base/screenshot14.png)

DERP(That was the original lander)

> ![screenshot16.png](http://i1239.photobucket.com/albums/ff503/Misterspork/Cloria%20I%20Mun%20Base/screenshot16.png)

Good view of errythang
Uhh, DOH?

> 
> Zekes - have you looked at the [Kosmos pack](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=7178.0)? it gives more variety of the same basic options, and has a low-resolution version to make things easier on people with less RAM in their systems.
> 
> I\'m not saying you should pick it over ExPI if you prefer that one - I just wasn\'t sure if you had downloaded it. The pictures in the OP there don\'t do it justice, there\'s a lot of variety in it - perhaps too much for this project, who knows.

No, I want to stick with mine, as the Kosmos panels doesn\'t work with 15.2...

> 
> No, I want to stick with mine, as the Kosmos panels doesn\'t work with 15.2...

They do.

You just have to switch vessels to make them expand/retract.
No, it says it isn\'t compatible with this version of KSP.

> 
> No, it says it isn\'t compatible with this version of KSP.

It is. You just didn\'t do it right.
I still like ExPI better- and Im sticking to that.

> 
> I still like ExPI better- and Im sticking to that.

Okay.

Then I\'ll probably end up picking Kosmos when I figure out what I want to do.

Okay, that wil be good.

So final decision: I put in ExPI for my mod.

It seems the original landers of Thrionian bases are doomed.

I\'ll fly my turn tonight after work!
How\'s it going?

It blew up? Darn. I should have ejected the skycrane, which wasn\'t supposed to be intact after landing anyway.

I\'ve finalized my landing request:

Same rover as last time to Aspiration Base.

I like rovers.

Right, I\'m going to see if i can get my ship to the Mun *without* C7 mod parts.

Here\'s hoping that the rocket tank sections will give it enough fuel.

EDIT:

The stock version *does not work*. If I can get it to take off, it spins out of control on ascent. If I try correcting that, it crashes on [or rather, off] the runway.

I may have to change my selected mod from VA Flight Pack to C7, and remove the passenger section from the original *Summer Sky*.

My flight\'s under way. I\'ll update once I get there.

![SB1YQ.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/SB1YQ.jpg)

The Polar Researcher I is well equipped for a flight down to Lake Kostok and back, and carries comm gear, cameras, lights for polar nights, and weaponry for fending off any hungry wildlife. 14 minutes under way and I\'m just south of the southernmost end of KSC\'s continent.
That\'s a nice plane.

About 10 minutes after I posted that, a huge thunderstorm came through the area knocking over trees and power lines. I still don\'t have power, and don\'t know when I will. I\'ll fly when I can today!

> 
> About 10 minutes after I posted that, a huge thunderstorm came through the area knocking over trees and power lines. I still don\'t have power, and don\'t know when I will. I\'ll fly when I can today!

Wow! 0\_0

NOTE: I will be taking over sss\'s flight, he gave me permission.

Hello : ) I would like to join in. I wouldn\'t want to request a turn right away though, but rather have it in a more RP-ish and community-oriented way. So:

I am a head of a private cargo company, specializing in cheap and reliable munar deliveries. All my craft is unmanned, I remote-control using my own network of 3 kerbostationary sats and 3 munar sats with all-around coverage (Should I get into this and if you accept the sat network mod in the list, I will set up the same system in your persistent).

I currently have the following standard loads available for delivery to your munbase:

1. Energy storage module - core module of the munbase power plant.

2. Cuttlefish lander - solar panel part of the power plant. A storage module and 6 landers make a complete power plant.

3. 'Armed Rovver' - a truck equipped with a manipulator arm for moving stuff around.

New payloads are being perfected now and will be available soon.

Please excuse the lack of pictures, will add some tomorrow. For now, here is a photo from the prototype test : ) Yes I did haul one of the landers from a few kilometers away.

> ![screenshot15wm.jpg](http://img805.imageshack.us/img805/2631/screenshot15wm.jpg)

So, what I am expecting here, is for you people to place orders here in the thread, I\'ll confirm and request a turn when I have tuned the launch. 1-2 days max : )

What say you?

I say you know what you doing. Launch ZIG. For great justice.

It\'s pretty much a certainty now that I will have to change my requested mod to C7. Well, at least i can still get my shuttle to the Mun and rove about gaily, eh?

> ![SDqaC.png](http://i.imgur.com/SDqaC.png)

...yeah...

I\'m going to bump myself off the list for taking too long. 

Shhhilent - letting you do that wouldn\'t be fair to all the other people who have patiently waited their turn. If sss isn\'t going to fly his turn, he gets removed from the list, not replaced with someone who he chooses. 

**sss is up - if he wants to fly it himself.**. Otherwise it\'s Tim Barrett\'s turn.

> 
> I\'m going to bump myself off the list for taking too long. 
> 
> Shhhilent - letting you do that wouldn\'t be fair to all the other people who have patiently waited their turn. If sss isn\'t going to fly his turn, he gets removed from the list, not replaced with someone who he chooses. 
> 
> **sss is up - if he wants to fly it himself.**. Otherwise it\'s Tim Barrett\'s turn.

Im afraid hes been muted. he cant reply.

shhilent, sorry, then. Feel free to register for a turn.

**Tim\_Barrett, It\'s your turn!**

----

I forgot to mention - BlackBicycle, you\'re welcome to book your flight however you want, but please keep the RP minimal. As stated in the first post, this is not a roleplaying thread. It\'s perfectly ok to let other people suggest which base you should add to, though.
